tool_description: Convert from English to Yoda speak. Yoda is a fictional character from the Movie star wars.
name: Yoda Translator
title: Yoda Translator

api_list.name: Yodish
api_list.description: Convert from English to Yoda Speak.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Text to convert to Yoda speak.
required_parameters.default: Master Obiwan has lost a planet.
